summary: Completed FAZ 3 testing for FLULANCE platform. All backend APIs (23/23 tests) passed. Frontend UI features (Media Library, Chat with attachments) working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Created test media files, contracts, milestones, and chat messages via API tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: FAZ 3 features are complete and working: 1) File Upload API (POST /api/upload) - supports images, videos, PDFs up to 50MB. 2) Chat with attachments (POST /api/matches/{match_id}/messages/with-attachment) - ChatBox component has paperclip button for file selection. 3) Media Library (POST/GET/DELETE /api/media-library) - Influencer Dashboard has 'Medya Kütüphanem' tab with file upload modal, filter tabs (Tümü, Resimler, Videolar, Dosyalar). 4) Contracts API (POST/GET /api/contracts) - contract creation and listing. 5) Milestones API (POST/GET /api/contracts/{id}/milestones) - milestone creation and tracking. 6) Advanced Search (GET /api/search/jobs, /api/search/influencers) - with filters for category, platform, budget, etc.

file_upload.details: POST /api/upload - image and PDF upload working, auth required, file type validation

media_library.details: POST/GET/DELETE /api/media-library - upload with tags/description, filter by file_type, delete working

chat_attachments.details: POST /api/matches/{match_id}/messages/with-attachment - send message with file, ChatBox UI has paperclip button

contracts.details: POST/GET /api/contracts - create contract for match, get my contracts

advanced_search.details: GET /api/search/jobs - query, category, platform, budget filters, sorting. GET /api/search/influencers - specialty, followers filters

frontend_media_library_tab.details: Medya Kütüphanem tab in Influencer Dashboard - shows uploaded files with tags, filter tabs, upload modal with file picker, tags input, description

frontend_chat_file_attachment.details: ChatBox component - paperclip button for file attachment, file preview, send with attachment working

api_endpoints_tested: POST /api/media-library - Upload to media library with tags
GET /api/media-library - Get media library (with file_type filter)
GET /api/search/jobs - Advanced job search with filters
